column2: Devotion is respected by the clergy and especially the head of your Religion. It can be spent to petition the head of your Religion. Like Prestige, it is added to your score on the death of a ruler.

Thuy Hoa is shamanistic tradition preserved orally since time immemorial, rumored to be descendant of Empire predating Kali-Yuga itself. The follower of this faith paid respect to direct lineages of ancient element gods in hope of prosperous life.
Cult of Sadet venerated the lineage of Sdet Fa and Sdet Fai, The Dual elemental deities who protected Degar Kingdom's from Kali-Yuga. Their adherents aspired to be worthy of their grace.

Satsana Pi is the religion of Vietnamese Tay originated from the primodial cult of Phaya Thaen, it was the faith of Nguyen court before they have been led astray. Time will tell if this faith will regain favor or die in obscurity.
Cult of Thaen is the ancient religion of Tay people that has persisted from persceution and competition through miraculously mean, May Thaen bless them in their quest to reclaim Sayam Pathet.
Hmongism is the faith of Hmong, combining Western tradition and Eastern spiritualism together

Cult of Ho is the spiritual descendant of personality cult formed around the ancient legendary leader, Uncle Ho. They believe that before Uncle Ho’s time, Vietnam was subjugated by many different creeds of foreigner. Even after Uncle Ho liberated the nation, the warlock of the west cursed them with infertile soils and dangerous trap. Still, with the nation free, He ruled justly until his ascent to Heavenly realm. The teaching he left behind encouraged his followers to govern justly and help fellow men, but also prioritize defense against revisionist and other reactionary forces.
